mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(pro_code, pro_name, pro_price,pro_desc,pro_desc2,pro_image) VALUES(#{pro_code}, #{pro_name}, #{pro_price},#{pro_desc},#{pro_desc2},#{pro_image})
mapper.select: SELECT pro_code, pro_name, pro_price from product WHERE pro_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cate}, '%')
select * from (select * from product) as T1 where pro_code like '%P%' limit #{skip},#{amount}

SELECT * FROM product WHERE pro_name IN (SELECT pro_name FROM (SELECT pro_name, SUM(totalPrice) AS total FROM pay WHERE status = '결제 완료' GROUP BY pro_name ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 3) AS subquery) ORDER BY (SELECT SUM(totalPrice) FROM pay WHERE pro_name = product.pro_name AND status = '결제 완료') DESC;

SELECT * FROM (SELECT pro_name, SUM(cart_cnt) as cart_cnt, SUM(CASE WHEN cart_show=0 THEN cart_cnt ELSE 0 END) as cart_show, ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN cart_show=0 THEN cart_cnt ELSE 0 END) * 100 / SUM(cart_cnt), 2) as ratio FROM cart GROUP BY pro_name HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN cart_show=0 THEN cart_cnt ELSE 0 END) >= 50 and ratio BETWEEN 1 AND 90 ORDER BY ratio DESC LIMIT 3) AS subquery JOIN product ON product.pro_name = subquery.pro_name ORDER BY subquery.ratio DESC;
select * from (select * from product) as T1 where pro_code like '%T%' limit #{skip},#{amount}
select * from (select * from product) as T1 where pro_code like '%O%' limit #{skip},#{amount}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET pro_name = #{pro_name}, pro_price = #{pro_price}, pro_desc = #{pro_desc}, pro_desc2 = #{pro_desc2}, pro_image = #{pro_image} WHERE pro_code = #{pro_code}
